name: I Am The Agent
description: I Am The Agent.com allows property owners the chance to take control & be the agent. We offer all the services of an estate agent at a fraction of the cost. The team formed over 10 years ago & heavily invested in research, business development & software. Our ethos is simple: I Am Saving. I Am in Control. I Am The Agent.com. We want to ensure there are no hidden costs, no tiny t&C's, no false advertising, no robbing the tenant to help landlord. Just fair and easy systems with experienced property assistants and client assistant to help you when YOU need it. We want to help tenants get fair deals with no unnecessary fees as well as a safe haven to ask questions, receive hints and tips when needed, help buyers with mortgages, insider knowledge on buying and more. It's about every move up or down the property ladder not just a corporate transaction, it's a move that changes peoples life journey. We have revolutionised an industry now we want to encourage a community.

team.name: Rebecca  Peach
team.bioHtml: Save thousands on the cost of selling your home. I Am The Agent will help you sell a house for £399 or rent for £49. No commission to pay!

jobs.title: Senior Developer/CTO
jobs.description:
We are looking for a superstar developer with experience in ASP.net, a front end and full stack developer. The role could evolve into a CTO role to join our two co-founders. Ideally experience in startups and be a top developer as well as taking on more CTO type roles and bring in top ideas to make the selling and renting property easier and more streamlined and fun.

Skills: (ASP.Net Applications, VB.NET, WebForms, WebForm, SQL Server, MicrosoftSQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ASP.NET, ASP.Net Developer. ASP.Net Software Developer, Visual Studio,full stack)

We still see ourselves as a start up and we are all a very hands on team with a passion for property and technology. We are seeking a superstar ASP and VB.Net web developer to join our successful in-house team. This is a fantastic opportunity for an experienced ASP/VB.net developer to work within our team and be part of changing an ailing industry.

The candidate will need to be self-motivated, forward thinking, confident, be able to build projects from the start until the end and be able to take real ownership of a project and become out shining start. 

It would be great if the candidate had worked within a start-up or similar industry.

This is a real opportunity for the right candidate and will allow for a great journey and to have hands on experience within a greatly disruptive and innovative young business.

jobs.title: Experienced Front-end/Javascript Developer
jobs.description:
About The Company

I Am The Agent was one of the UK’s first online estate agents, established back in 2011. From the word go, it’s been our aim to match sellers and landlords with buyer and tenants, as simply and cost-effectively as possible, cutting out expensive agency commissions and fees. We don’t charge tenant fees and never have. Our charges are transparent and clear, and there are never any hidden extras. We’ve marketed 10,000 properties to date, so our clients know and trust the business. Our vision is to build a trusted community driven by property, the go-to online agency run by the people, for the people. 

We are now seeking to grow our team as part of the next phase of our planned expansion and we’re looking for enthusiastic and committed candidates to take us to the next level. 

The Role 

 We are looking for an experienced and passionate front-end developer to join our growing team, providing high-quality html/css/javascript and integrating with web services via Angular. You will be working with our back-end C# developers and be involved in planning, architecting and delivering functionality for our website, both customer facing and for the customer services team. The role will bring in top ideas to make selling and renting property easier, more streamlined and fun.  


Responsibilities 

Plan, architect and deliver pages, components, and functionality  

Develop using advanced JavaScript, applying best practice, frameworks and code libraries appropriately 

Ensure appropriate support for our range of supported browsers 

Troubleshooting and bug fixing 

Requirements gathering, formulating approach, completion of projects and individual tasks to deadline 

To be considered for the role you must have:  

 
Experienced Html 5/Css 3/Javascript developer (3 years minimum) 

Experience using Angular with web services 

Distributed version control systems such as Git and Mercurial 

Good analytical and problem-solving skills 

Excellent communications skills and the ability to work well with others 

Experience with C# and/or Kendo UI / Telerik controls desirable 

 
This is a fantastic opportunity for an experienced ASP/VB.net developer to work within our team and have hands-on experience within a greatly disruptive and innovative young business. The role will initially be based in our Greenwich office with a potential office move (in south-east London) in the next couple of months. 

The candidate will need to be self-motivated, forward-thinking, confident, be able to build projects from the start until the end and be able to take real ownership of a project and become outshining start.  

Remuneration 
TBC

Team 

You'll join a small, founding team of developers and client services members, who are all passionate about delivering excellent service and constantly improving the client journey to find and sell homes. 

Apply 

Please send CV plus examples of recent projects to kris.hannah@iamtheagent.com. Closing date for applications: 01.04.18

jobs.title: Digital Graphic Designer
jobs.description:
About The Company. 

I Am The Agent was one of the UK’s first online estate agents, established back in 2011. From the word go, it’s been our aim to match sellers and landlords with buyer and tenants, as simply and cost-effectively as possible, cutting out expensive agency commissions and fees.

 We don’t charge tenant fees and never have. Our charges are transparent and clear, and there are never any hidden extras. We’ve marketed 10,000 properties to date, so our clients know and trust the business. Our vision is to build a trusted community driven by property, the go-to online agency run by the people, for the people. 

We are now seeking to grow our team as part of the next phase of our planned expansion and we’re looking for enthusiastic and committed candidates to take us to the next level. 

The Role 

We are looking for an experienced digital/graphic designer to manage all aspects of digital and graphic design for the business, from our website and mobile platform to display advertising (bus, tube, billboard, newspaper) to promote the brand as well as providing assets to support the digital marketing team. The successful candidate will take bring fresh ideas and a passion for design and will actively contribute to the usability and feel of the platform and the development marketing strategy. 

Responsibilities 

Manage and support the development of the design and visual language of the brand across website, mobile, apps and display advertising 

Evolve brand guidelines, ensure consistency for brands across all communication channels 

Bring fresh ideas for design and content creation to the marketing team using your expertise and eye for great design aligned with the target market 

Scope and create templates for marketing campaigns, landing pages, digital initiatives, email and display advertising 

 
To be considered for the role you must have:  

3-5 years experience as a full-time in-house or agency digital designer is ideal 

Experience with responsive design for web/tablet/mobile 

Experience with display advertising 

Experience working under pressure to tight deadlines 

Attention to detail 

Work autonomously as well as part of a team 

Experience within the property/estate agency sector desirable but not essential

Project planning and across digital and print content


This is a fantastic opportunity for an experienced digital/graphic designer to work within our team and have hands-on experience within a greatly disruptive and innovative young business. The role will initially be based in our Greenwich office with a potential office move (in south-east London) in the next couple of months. 

The candidate will need to be self-motivated, forward-thinking, confident, be able to build projects and campaigns from the start to finish, be able to take real ownership of a project and become our shining star.  

Team 

You'll join a small, founding team of developers and client services members, who are all passionate about delivering excellent service and constantly improve the client journeys to find and sell homes. We are all very excited by the investment and looking forward to rapid growth and a thrilling journey that will shine on your CV. 

Salary
The salary is broad as we would consider strong graduates and experienced designers. 

Apply 

Please send CV plus examples of recent projects to kris.hannah@iamtheagent.com.
